Enum Clef

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Clef>
      com.myronmarston.music.notation.Clef
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotationElement, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Clef>
public enum Clef
extends java.lang.Enum<Clef>
implements NotationElement

Enumerates the clef possibilities.

getBestMatchForNoteList

public static Clef getBestMatchForNoteList(java.util.List<NotationNote> notes)
Gets the clef that is the best match for the given of notes. The "best match" algorithm tries to reduce the number of ledger lines needed.

Parameters:
notes - the list of notation notes
Returns:
the clef that is the best match for this list

median note number

Returns:
the clef that is closest to this note number
